title: The secret to not getting banned
body:
All you have to do is spend some money in the shop regularly because Riot does not ban Players that pay a lot of money. I got this confirmed on multiple occasions where the support team told me they cannot tell me if the subject was punished or not because of data protection and stuff. When I looked up the profiles of those players I noticed whenever they had some kind of money spend in the store i.e. and Icon or a skin I noticed ingame they wouldnt get banned even if they inted multiple games. I guess this is an open secret now but I dont think I will spend more money than usual on League anyway.


Excited to see how long this will remain on the forums until it gets deleted.
